resources.string: Choose the number that is bigger.\nThe questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.

"Congratulations, the level is passed!\n Did you know that 7 is considered as the luckiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents in the world, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of creation and much more. 7 is also considered the most favorite number for people all over the world."
Choose the roman number that is bigger.\nThe questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is passed!\n Do you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
Which animal shows its tongue the most?\n The questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is passed!\n do you know? that a woodpecker, when hitting a tree with its beak, retracts its tongue and wraps it around its brain to protect it."
choose something edible\n The questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.

"Congratulations, the level is passed!\n It is known that many crocodiles swallow stones. But not because they are edible for them. Stones help them to sink into the water faster and stay on the bottom."
choose faster animal\n The questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is passed!\n The fastest land animal in the world, a cheetah can reach 112km/h in just three seconds - that's faster than a sport car accelerators!"
choose city with a larger population?\n The questions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, you successfully finished the game! You have 120/120 points!\n Do you know, than Tokyo is the most populated city in the world, with more than 38 million people"
